title: Mini-Ep 63: Brush Hands
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 63: Brush Hands
itunes:subtitle: Doree's back! She and Kate field responses regarding beauty mishaps of the past, including a caller who shares a particularly poignant epiphany. They also hear from a listener who wonders what to do whilst on maternity leave and lend advice to a P...
description:
Doree's back! She and Kate field responses regarding beauty mishaps of the past, including a caller who shares a particularly poignant epiphany. They also hear from a listener who wonders what to do whilst on maternity leave and lend advice to a PhD student who is feeling overwhelmed and angry.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics - Go to fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for only $24 when you sign up for a VIP membership.
  • Honeybook - Get 50% off your first year of Honeybook when you go to honeybook.com and use promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
